title: Ecosystem services potential and soil conservation policies with emphasis on degraded pastures in Brazil
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Geography and Sustainability, Volume 5, Issue 4

Author(s): Adriana Monteiro da Costa, Maise Soares de Moura, Isadora Fonseca Navarro, Victor Cordeiro da Silva, Teresa Cristina Tarlé Pissarra, Carlos Alberto Valera, Luís Filipe Sanches Fernandes, Fernando Antonio Leal Pacheco
